title: Bill Bruford - The Autobiography: Yes, King Crimson, Earthworks and More
description: Bill Bruford has been at the top of his profession for four decades, playing with Yes, King Crimson, Genesis, Earthworks, & many more. This is his memoir of life at the heart of prog rock, art rock, & modern jazz. It is an honest, entertaining, well-written account of life on the road & in the studio.
author: Bill Bruford
